title: How to Toast Sesame Seeds
description:
Learn how to toast sesame seeds with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Toast-Sesame-Seeds

subtitles: to toast sesame seeds in the oven first spread out the seeds in a single layer on a baking sheet then toast the seeds in the oven at 350 degrees fahrenheit 177 degrees celsius for 8 to 10 minutes or until they're golden brown you can also toast sesame seeds on the stove first spread the seeds out in a skillet then turn the stove to medium heat toast the sesame seeds for three to five minutes or until they're golden brown stirring them occasionally use your toasted sesame seeds in a recipe right away or store them in an airtight container in the refrigerator or freezer for up to a yearto toast sesame seeds in the oven first spread out the seeds in a single layer on a baking sheet then toast the seeds in the oven at 350 degrees fahrenheit 177 degrees celsius for 8 to 10 minutes or until they're golden brown you can also toast sesame seeds on the stove first spread the seeds out in a skillet then turn the stove to medium heat toast the sesame seeds for three to five minutes or until they're golden brown stirring them occasionally use your toasted sesame seeds in a recipe right away or store them in an airtight container in the refrigerator or freezer for up to a year

title: How to Delete Dropbox from Mac
uploader: Mac OS X Tutorials and App reviews from HowTech
description:
Learn how to delete dropbox from mac.

Don't forget to check out our site http://howtech.tv/ for more free how-to videos!
http://youtube.com/ithowtovids - our feed
http://www.facebook.com/howtechtv - join us on facebook
https://plus.google.com/103440382717658277879 - our group in Google+

To delete dropbox from your mac right click on the dropbox icon in the menu bar at the top right. Select launch dropbox website.

Once your dropbox opens online select the arrow next to your name. Click settings.

Click on the account settings tab. Under account preferences click the delete my account link.

Enter your password. Enter a reason your leaving. Enter in additional information if you like. Then click on delete my account.

Your dropbox account will now be deleted.

title: Do's and Don'ts for Using Coconut Oil on Your Hair | wikiHow Asks a Licensed Cosmetologist
description:
Learn the do's and don't of using coconut oil on your hair with licensed cosmetologist, Courtney Foster. Read more in this wikiHow guide: https://www.wikihow.com/Use-Coconut-Oil-on-Your-Hair-and-Skin
--- 
Courtney Foster is a Licensed Cosmetologist, Certified Hair Loss Practitioner, and Cosmetology Educator based out of New York City. Courtney runs Courtney Foster Beauty, LLC and her work has been featured on The Wendy Williams Show, Good Morning America, The Today Show, The Late Show with David Letterman, and in East/West Magazine. She received her Cosmetology License from the State of New York after training at the Empire Beauty School - Manhattan.
Learn more: https://www.courtneyfosterbeauty.com/
---

title: How to Use Lemon Juice to Lighten Hair
description:
Learn how to use lemon juice to lighten hair with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Use-Lemon-Juice-to-Lighten-Hair

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/wikihow/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@wikihow
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
subtitles: to lighten your hair with lemon juice first mix together two parts water and one part lemon juice if you have dry hair you can use three parts lemon juice and one part leave-in conditioner instead pour the mixture into a spray bottle then wet your hair so it's damp but not soaked spritz the lemon juice mixture into your hair then go outside in the sun for one to two hours to activate the citric acid in the lemon juice and lighten your hair make sure you wear sunscreen finally wash your hair with shampoo and conditioner to remove the lemon juice and enjoy your new sunkissed hairto lighten your hair with lemon juice first mix together two parts water and one part lemon juice if you have dry hair you can use three parts lemon juice and one part leave-in conditioner instead pour the mixture into a spray bottle then wet your hair so it's damp but not soaked spritz the lemon juice mixture into your hair then go outside in the sun for one to two hours to activate the citric acid in the lemon juice and lighten your hair make sure you wear sunscreen finally wash your hair with shampoo and conditioner to remove the lemon juice and enjoy your new sunkissed hair

title: How to Warm Tortillas
description:
Learn how to warm tortillas with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Warm-Tortillas

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to warm tortillas in the oven lightly sprinkle or spray both sides with water stack five to eight tortillas on top of each other and wrap them in foil then bake them in an oven preheated to 375 degrees fahrenheit for 10 to 15 minutes if you prefer to warm your tortillas in the skillet either moisten them with water or for crispier tortillas brush each side with a little oil or butter then place the tortillas into the skillet one at a time for 30 seconds on each sideto warm tortillas in the oven lightly sprinkle or spray both sides with water stack five to eight tortillas on top of each other and wrap them in foil then bake them in an oven preheated to 375 degrees fahrenheit for 10 to 15 minutes if you prefer to warm your tortillas in the skillet either moisten them with water or for crispier tortillas brush each side with a little oil or butter then place the tortillas into the skillet one at a time for 30 seconds on each side

title: How to Zest a Lemon
description:
Learn How to Zest a Lemon with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Zest-a-Lemon

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to zest the lemon start by cleaning it thoroughly with water and soap then hold a grater over a cutting board at a 45-degree angle and gently run the lemon down it if you don't have a grater you can use a knife or vegetable peeler to cut off the outer yellow peel from the fruit if needed dice up the peel into smaller pieces before adding it to your recipeto zest the lemon start by cleaning it thoroughly with water and soap then hold a grater over a cutting board at a 45-degree angle and gently run the lemon down it if you don't have a grater you can use a knife or vegetable peeler to cut off the outer yellow peel from the fruit if needed dice up the peel into smaller pieces before adding it to your recipe
